alert.note: Alert for Crockett; Dyer; Lauderdale (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 25 at 9:16AM CDT until March 25 at 2:33PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...Observed flooding changed to Minor severity and increased in duration for the following rivers in Tennessee... South Fork of the Forked Deer near Halls ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...South Fork of the Forked Deer near Halls. * WHEN...Until this afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 9.0 feet, Farmland near the river is flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 AM CDT Saturday the stage was 9.1 feet. - Forecast...The river will continue to fall and is expected to fall to 7.3 feet by Thursday morning. - Flood stage is 9.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at weather.gov/memphis. The next statement will be issued as conditions warrant.
